title: Sample survey of residents to commute by gondolas

content.description: The transportation department of a large city wants to estimate the proportion of residents who would use a system of aerial gondolas to commute to work. The gondolas would be part of the cityâ€™s effort to relieve traffic congestion. The department asked a random sample of residents whether they would use the gondolas. The residents could respond with yes, no, or maybe.
content.question: Which of the following is the best description of the method for data collection used by the department?

choices.label: An experiment with a completely randomized design
An experiment with a randomized block design
An experiment with a matched-pairs design

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
